attributes.action: ignore outright the petitions against the road pricing proposals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These petitions are based on ignorance of both the proposals and of the realities that face Britain's road infrastructure. Furthermore, these petitions reflect not a depth of feeling and reasoned opinion so much as collective hysteria.

We urgently need a transport overhaul in this country, one that prioritises public transport, and also one that ensures that those who frequently use the roads pay for them.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
